DOC.brief_summary: A prospective, non-randomized trial to evaluate post-operative health care resource utilization after maxillary balloon antrostomy using FinESS Sinus Treatment in the physician's office.
DOC.brief_title: RELIEF: Healthcase Utilization and Outcomes of FinESS Treatment in the Office
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective, non-randomized trial to evaluate post-operative health care resource utilization after maxillary balloon antrostomy using FinESS Sinus Treatment in the physician's office. Also to demonstrate the long term durability of FinESS Sinus Treatment performed in an office setting.
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older Male or Female subjects Diagnosis of rhinosinusitis (CT radiographic evidence and Medical Evaluation) Willing to comply ith protocol requirements Able to provide consent Hemophilia Cystic Fibrosis Ciliary Dysfunction Severe septal deviation causing obstruction of the ostiomeatal unit Pregnant females
